content:
Using emails below for inspo, can you create new ones :

Details of the dinner:
When: 25th April from 18:30pm to 22:30pm
Where: Private Room at Michelin star restaurant The Ninth, London, 22 Charlotte St, W1T 2NB
Hosts: (6sense) SVP of Sales, Mark Ebert, VP of Sales EMEA, Paul Gilhooly
Other attendees: CROs and VPs of Sales from leading B2B businesses 
No partner companies involved, just 6sense. Emails can be very similar, mention michelin star
Subject: Invite: VIP Dinner –– 6sense & PMG

Hi {{First Name}},

These are tricky, transformative times for sales & marketing teams … and let’s face it, these days, we all need as much help and intel as we can get.

That’s why I’m inviting you to join your peers and revenue leaders from 6sense and PMG to discuss your challenges and how the proper tactics and technologies can empower you to proceed with confidence throughout 2023.

Oh, and you’ll have an exceptional dinner (on us!). 

Here are the details:

Where: George & John at The Drisco, Auerbach St 6, Tel Aviv-Yafo (We’ll pick up the bill.)

When: Tuesday 14th March. Drinks start at 7pm. Dinner from 7:30 pm to 10 pm.

Hosts: 6sense’s EMEA team, including Marketing Director, Stef Iacono, Director of Customer Success, Brice Crozier, and our Commercial Sales Leader, Liam Wedderburn –– plus Kfir Pravda from PMG.

Please reply to RSVP. 

Speak soon,
— — — 
Email 2 - Summary 

Subject: in-thread 

Hi {{First Name}},

I’m checking in to see if you’re free to join us for our VIP dinner at the George & John restaurant at The Drisco at 7pm on Tuesday 14th March.

Your hosts will include 6sense EMEA Marketing Director, Stef Iacono, Director of Customer Success, Brice Crozier, and our Commercial Sales Leader, Liam Wedderburn.

They’ll be chatting about the challenges (and solutions!) of account-based sales strategies, a topic they’ve been trailblazing for years: 
Stef established 6sense’s European revenue team and generated 150% of pipeline targets for the region in its first year
Liam leads a sales function with team members achieving up to 148% of quota in their first 9 months at 6sense
Learn how they’re succeeding (and network with your peers!) in a relaxed setting while enjoying a delicious dinner on us. To book your seat, please reply to this email. 

Let me know if you have any questions. .

 
— — — 
Email 3 - Follow up

Subject: in-thread

Hi {{First Name}},

I wanted to double-check if you’re free for our dinner on Tuesday 14th March?

I’ve summarised the key info below:

Dinner (on us) at the George & John at The Drisco 
Discuss current challenges and share solutions with fellow revenue leaders from some of Israel’s top B2B SaaS companies
Meet 6sense’s EMEA leaders as they share strategies global revenue leaders are implementing in 2023

When & where: George & John at The Drisco on Tuesday 14th March. Drinks start at 7 pm. Dinner from 7:30 pm to 10 pm. (We’ll pick up the bill.)
 
It’s set to be a fantastic evening. Let me know if you’d like to join us or if you have any questions. 
 
Thanks,

— — — 
Email 4 - Referral 

Subject: Referral 6sense & PMG VIP Dinner

Hi {{First Name}},
 
Our VIP Dinner is approaching fast. If you can’t make it, is there a senior colleague from your revenue team who you’d recommend for the guest list?

Hosted at George & John at The Drisco, our Dinner Club is a relaxed space to meet your peers, discuss challenges, and share expertise.
 
Date: Tuesday 14th March
Time: Drinks at 7 pm. Dinner from 7:30 pm to 10 pm
Location: George & John at The Drisco, Auerbach St 6, Tel Aviv-Yafo

Let me know if you’re available, or if you have another revenue leader in mind.

Thanks,
